content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No permanent structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab intended to supply Automation Science Packs at position (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded. While processing was performed using existing smelting furnaces (for example, one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) used for iron plate production and another at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) used for copper plate production), these were not constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Incorrect use of get_entities API:
  – Errors reported include an unexpected keyword argument "radius" and supplying positional arguments when none are expected.
  – Tip: Verify the function signature and supply parameters exactly as specified by the API.

• Lab placement failures:
  – Multiple errors occurred when attempting to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) due to no lab item being available in the inventory.
  – Tip: Ensure that the necessary lab components are present in the inventory before initiating placement.

• Lab crafting chain issues:
  – Attempts to craft a Lab failed due to missing sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) and deficiencies in the prerequisite production processes.
  – Tip: Confirm that all required sub-components in the crafting chain are sufficiently available and that any necessary intermediate production (e.g., smelting and component crafting) is operational.

• Handling of None values when retrieving entities:
  – An error occurred when iterating over a NoneType returned from get_entities.
  – Tip: Check for a None response and default to an empty list to avoid iteration errors.
